scripts.version:patch:build: npm run version:patch && npm run build
scripts.version:minor:build: npm run version:minor && npm run build
scripts.version:major:build: npm run version:major && npm run build
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
